title: Chris Antoine
text: I am Senior at Moravian College studying Economics with a concentration of Management in organizational leadership with a minor in Africana Studies and Peace Corps Certification. Im a Division 3 track and field conference champion in the 4x1 and 4x2 for two consecutive years besides athletics I am highly active in my community especially in the Black Student Union empowering young minds especially black and brown minds is always an aspiration for me. I am Moravian College's 2nd Newman Civic Fellow award recipient and a Resident Advisor as well as an AICUP advocate for the institution. Last but not least I am member the most noble klan Kappa Alpha Psi Fraternity, Incorporated and currently serving as the Keeper of Exchequer or more commonly known as treasurer. Future aspirations upon graduation is to take my degree into the armed forces as a Corporal Specialist in the Army and then ultimately receive my MBA.

title: Baru Roberson
text: I am from New Jersey and I enjoy playing basketball and hanging with friends. I attend Moravian College and will graduate in May of 2019. My major is Health Science with a minor in Africana Studies. Some of the extracurriculars that I participate in are, Senior Resident Advisor, Black Student Union, Senior Gift Committee & Presidentâ€™s Council for Diversity & Inclusion just to name a few. I aspire to work in higher education one day, in order to help underrepresented college students achieve their professional goals.

title: Max Louissaint
text: I was born in Haiti but moved to Philadelphia around the age of 11 years old. I speak multiple languages; Haitian Creole, French, and English. I am a Mechanical Engineering major and a Computer Science minor at Lehigh University. My primary interest are automotive and robotics. I am a member of National Society of Black Engineers (NSBE), Formula SAE, African Caribbean Cultural Club, and Men of Color Alliance (MOCA). During my free time, I like to listen to music, watch movies, play soccer, or play basketball.
